ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Tenure", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "The internship will be available throughout the year on a Quarterly basis, Internship will be offered for a duration of upto 03 months, which may be extended to a maximum period of 06 months. No internship of duration less than two months will be offered. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Assignments", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Interns would be attached to one of the several Divisions at FSSAI (HQ)/ROs/Labs depending on the academic and technical training and assigned project(s) related to different aspects of Food and Nutrition Management Processes. "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": ""}]}, {"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Place & Domain of Internship", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Region: FSSAI (HQ), New Delhi; Topics/Subjects: Science & Standards; Regulation; Regulatory Compliance; KRCDC (Library); Human Resource; Finance & Accounts; Trade and International Cooperation/Imports; Quality Assurance; Legal; IT"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Region: Regional Offices (Chennai & Kolkata); Topics/Subjects: Food Imports Clearance and Licensing"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Region: National Food Laboratory, Ghaziabad, Kolkata and Chennai; Topics/Subjects: Food Sampling and Testing"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "Region: NFL Kolkata Extension Centre, Raxaul; Topics/Subjects: Food Sampling and Testing"}]}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 3, "value": "composite", "label": "Composite"}, "benefits": [{"type": "block_quote", "children": [{"text": "Stipend", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "A stipend of \u20b9 10,000/- (Rupees ten thousand only) for the internship period will be given to the deserving Interns on the recommendation of the Office/Division that they are attached with by the respective FSSAI (HQ)/Regional Offices / Laboratories.

> **Mode of Intimation** The final list of selected candidates along with their date of joining and Internship tenure would be declared online on the FSSAI website by the respective office where they have opted for internship.
